Amazon EC2 Container Service - Full time, Seattle, WA

We are hiring for a number of positions on the EC2 Container Service [1] team including software development managers [2], software development engineers [3], and web development engineers [4]. To date our focus has primarily been on building out a highly scalable set of backend services and distributed systems to manage and expose container and cluster state and for task scheduling. We are now looking to add engineers with a strong systems background, particularly around OS virtualization and networking.

We are a growing team of (mostly) experienced engineers that likes to iterate quickly. We value scalability, operability, and security and expect everyone on the team to have a say in feature design and prioritization. We also have some fun open source projects [5]. If you are interested apply at the links below or contact me (email address is in my profile).
